text: 5.11: Mt 18.17; Ro 16.17; 2 Te 3.6; Ta 3.10; 2 Zo 1.10Gu kha kameŋ khergi, ne nɨɨeŋ khaŋ muuŋgi. Gu kha zɨn wari ga rɨgi gumgi, gu mbe nzuai. Mbe khaŋ nzuai, “Gu guigira Krais khothɨgi.” Maaŋ nzuai guma, ana ruarir mbigi ndi o, ana harigi gumgi bigi garav, nta niihi o, ana mbarɨvi gu tori rotu mbui o, ana harigi gumgi zɨrir farfagi o, ana pharar ŋanŋani pav o, ana harigi gumgi bigi kɨɨi, nde ana phorgɨ ru thari. Nde vhɨra mba khesharigi guma phorgɨ mbɨ thari.
